EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_COPY: Unplug. Pack light. And get productive your way, all day with the new Surface Pro.
EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_POPLEFT_COPY: Up to 13.5 hours of video playback.*
EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_POPLEFT_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_POPTOP_COPY: Stay online wherever you are with LTE Advanced.*
EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_POPRIGHT_COPY: Available exclusively at select retailers like this one.
EXPERIENCE_STUDIO_COPY: Open, lower, or close the built-in kickstand to find the perfect angle for working, watching, drawing, and more.
EXPERIENCE_STUDIO_TRYIT_POP_COPY: Pick up the device and transform from laptop to studio mode.
EXPERIENCE_LAPTOP_COPY: Professional. Student. Creator. Whatever you do, Surface Pro features the latest Intel® Core™ processors for powerful performance and faster multitasking.
EXPERIENCE_LAPTOP_TRYIT_POP_COPY: Pick up the device and try detaching the keyboard.
EXPERIENCE_LAPTOP_POPCENTER_COPY: Surface Pro is the ultimate laptop for running powerful, professional apps* you rely on every day, all while on the go.
EXPERIENCE_LAPTOP_POPRIGHT_COPY: Full-size USB 3.0, Mini Display Port and microSDXC card reader for essential productivity connections.
EXPERIENCE_TABLET_COPY: From inside to out, Surface Pro is designed for performance you can take just about anywhere.
EXPERIENCE_TABLET_POPLEFT_COPY: Fanless cooling system so you can stream your favorite show in peace.*
EXPERIENCE_TABLET_POPTOP_COPY: Made for mobility, starting at just 1.7 lbs and only 0.33” thin.
EXPERIENCE_TABLET_POPRIGHT_COPY: Razor-sharp 12.3” PixelSense™ Display, built for touch and pen.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_COPY: New Surface Pen* is better and faster, with precision ink on one end and rubber eraser on the other.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_ONE: Jot down a note, create an amazing artwork, and more.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_TWO: Naturally write and draw with tilt functionality.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_THREE: 4,096 pressure points to sketch, shade, and paint with artistic precision.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_FOUR: Rest your palm right on the screen as you create.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_TRYIT_COPY: Pick up Surface Pen and start coloring.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_COPY: Surface Pro Type Cover* is ultra-slim, yet performs like a traditional keyboard, including a complete mechanical keyset, backlit keys, and extra-large trackpad.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_POPLEFT_COPY: Soft, smooth Alcantara® material for an added touch of luxury.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_POPTOP_COPY: Natural writing and drawing tool, perfect for creating in new ways.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_COPY: Surface Arc Mouse* is designed to conform to your hand and snaps flat to fit in your bag.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_POPLEFT_COPY: Senses up to five points at once, for precise control and navigation.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_POPRIGHT_COPY: No cords or dongles, connect wirelessly to your Surface via Bluetooth.
BEST_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Full Windows 10 features and capabilities on an ultra-convenient device.
BEST_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Use Cortana* to set reminders on your PC and get it later on your phone. Access your photos, notes, and Office docs on all your devices (Android, iOS, etc.).
BEST_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Cortana available in select markets. Experience may vary by region and device.
BEST_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Sign in to your device and apps with a smile or a touch.
BEST_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Work anywhere, online or offline. Office 365 sold separately.
COMPARE_COPY: Compare features and specs to see how each Surface device stacks up.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_COPY: Incredibly powerful and portable with all-day battery life*, now available with LTE Advanced.**
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_COPY_LEGAL: **LTE functionality only available on Surface Pro i5/256GB SSD/8GB with LTE Advanced. Contact your service provider for availability, details, compatibility, pricing, SIM card, and activation.

COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Soft, ultra-portable design and available LTE Advanced** for easy connectivity.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: **LTE functionality only available on Surface Pro i5/256GB SSD/8GB with LTE Advanced. Contact your service provider for availability, details, compatibility, pricing, SIM card, and activation.

COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_THREE_LEGA: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.

COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Fanless cooling system**** lets you work, play, and stream in peace.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_LEGAL: ****Fanless cooling system included with Surface Pro m3 and i5 models only.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_COPY: Nearly 4x more power and up to 17 hours* of battery life, with blazing graphics in a 15” or 13.5” PixelSense™ Display.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_COPY_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_ONE_TITLE: Designed with innovation in every detail
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Lightweight and powerful with unprecedented performance in a laptop this size.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Up to 17 hours of battery life* and 70% more than MacBook Pro 13”.*
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Stunning color and graphics in 15” or 13.5” touchscreen displays.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Switch seamlessly between Laptop, Tablet, Studio, and View Modes.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Connect, charge, transfer, and display via USB-C, USB 3.1, full-size SD card, and Surface Dock.**
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_COPY: Take your ideas from concept to reality with blazing graphics, innovative features, and a 28” PixelSense™ Display.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_ONE_TITL: Designed for the way you work
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Use Surface Studio upright, or draw on it like a drafting table.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Unlock your creativity with Surface Pen*, Surface Dial*, and touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_THREE_CO: Run all your favorite software, like Adobe® CC,* Office 365,* and more.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COP: 13.5 million pixels of pure, true-to-life color and clarity.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COP: 4x USB 3.0, USB-C, full-size SD™ card reader (SDXC compatible), 3.5mm headset jack, and 1 Gb Ethernet port.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_COPY: Go beyond the traditional laptop with the perfect balance of power and sleek design.

COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_THREE_COP: Aluminum shell and durable Alcantara® keyboard–all at just 2.76 pounds.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Razor-sharp resolution on an interactive screen made for touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Omnisonic Speakers deliver crisp, clear audio for music, shows, and more.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_COPY: Laptop performance meets tablet portability to deliver the flexibility you need.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Only 0.33” thin and starting at just 1.15 lbs. to fit easily in your bag.
